title: Please ! Please don't do this
body:
https://image.noelshack.com/fichiers/2019/13/5/1553816806-sans-titre-2.jpg
Don't be fooled by his weird people who want a Ahri Wukong relationship, PLEASE DOES NOT DO IT

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Small Boobs Ahri,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-03-28T23:47:09.439+0000)
>
> Ahri Wukong relationship

Ahri doesn't want a relationship, not after what happened in her past. Unless Rito decides to retcon stuff.

Ahri and Kong are vastaya, so they've likely met at some point.

Nami is Vastaya, too. From completely different place.
Vastayas are not living in one small place.
True. I should have been more specific. Both Ahri and Kong are from Ionia and they haven't left.
It's not about having a relationship, it's Wukong the problem. :3 (for me) :monkaS:
To be honest, I'm more interested in the whole "Wuju" thing. I couldn't care less about Kong, but he has a role in this topic.
he was taught wuju by master yi, which is just moving fast, I think..?

Going off the ability named "Wuju Style" (Master Yi's E) I'm guessing it just has something to do with precision and focusing your energy into bursts of strength. It might also be a thing similar to like, the Force, where different people can manipulate it in different ways.

> [{quoted}](name=Small Boobs Ahri,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-03-28T23:54:24.488+0000)
>
> It's not about having a relationship, it's Wukong the problem. :3 (for me) :monkaS:

Grow bigger boobs and the problem will go away
Pssh, not all Vastaya know each other, gosh. (joke on not all X know X)
be careful you might atttract the monstrous Xano501
It's like Bloody Mary, if you say Ahri X Wukong 3 times he appears

Hm... They didn't give us a definite answer that we will be getting a Ahri x Wukong ship though, keep that in mind. They just asked "why do you ask" with a winky face. I'm thinking that it's just a playful nod and not actually a confirmation.

I am slightly nervous about a Ahri x Wukong ship, but I don't know if Riot will actually go through with it. It's based from the fan community, but doesn't have any lore origins, and I think Riot is hesitant to follow through on ships that weren't hinted at before by old lore. So if you're worried about it becoming canon, I don't think you need to worry much.

Riot's not shipping anyone. They have only ever been listed as friends and that's all that Riot would end up doing. People are just making a big deal out of nothing. They have been listed in each others related champs lists for over 7+ years with no reasoning for it, they are just answering it. Same thing as when they explained why {{champion:13}} knows so many champs, he's not having a relationship with a bunch of different champs, he just went on an adventure with them and knows them from that. This is likely going to be the same thing.
Adds more fuel to the fire. More ammo for the shippers. etc.

Here's the thing. Who cares?  People Ship Lux and Garen even though they are BLOOD RELATED Siblings. People ship others with {{champion:498}} and {{champion:497}} when the are obviously dating each other. Shippers are going to ship, lore or not. complaining about getting new lore is just causing us more harm then it is you guys. WE don't get many chances to get new lore. YOU have a popular as hell champ. new lore for her isn't just assumed, it's inevitable. In fact it's more likely Ahri ends up getting a comic series for herself by next year. Wukong on the other hand will be lucky if this new lore thing even turns into a short story for his OWN bio (not just be a side characters in Ahri's).
idk why u got downvoted, you're right. They've been on each others list for years. It's nbd. I think people up in arms just because of one troll who should've beenbanned long ago

Perhaps, perhaps not? But I think Riot is well aware that people ship Ahri and Wukong together, and for that people are nervous if they will make a reference to that or not.

I don't think it's that bad for people to be anxious about what's going to happen to their favorite characters.

They are aware, but they are also aware of how many **more** people hate the ship and how much more popular Ahri is then Wukong (one champ is used for world wide ads, merch, skins and such, the other just pops up when China is involved). Honestly, Riot tends to be good about relationships in this game. They know (more often then not) that they need to keep characters as romantically open as possible cause people do like to ship them with themselves. Yea, anxious is fine. but out right jumping the gun and trying to force the idea of "RIOT IS TRYING TO FORCE THIS SHIP, DON'T LET THEM FORCE THIS SHIP" is just getting overly worked up for nothing and will just end up making EVERYONE wait longer on lore for both champs because of it.
Ah, alright then. I understand.
Don't worry. Scathlocke hates love.

> [{quoted}](name=SkiptoMyLuo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=0012,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:53:11.048+0000)
>
> Don't worry. Scathlocke hates love.

I see they're a person of culture then.

/wrists

Not again. Not after the Vastaya Update. I was depressed enough.
What was wrong with the Vastaya update?

> [{quoted}](name=NineTailedMystic,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2019-03-29T13:17:02.758+0000)
>

> 
> Not again. Not after the Vastaya Update. I was depressed enough.

What happened during the update other than Ahri going from a gumiho to a spirit kemonomimi?

Well Wukong is the only champion related to Ahri in game info 
So there is no one to ship Ahri with other than Wukong 
People probably hate it because he is a monkey

At anyway , I ship her with me {{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
I believe that was because Koreans wanted to ship it and even made some little movie about their love relationship

> [{quoted}](name=Ahris,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=00040002,timestamp=2019-03-29T18:28:43.640+0000)
>
> I believe that was because Koreans wanted to ship it and even made some little movie about their love relationship

a Rioter just kind of hinted that something between Ahri and Wukong gonna happen
Doesn't necessarily have to be something romantic, tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Rathar Dashing,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2019-03-29T01:58:25.613+0000)
>
> Well the only champ related to Janna is Ekko, does that mean Riot should ship them, too?
> I hate it because Ahri shouldn't be shipped with anyone, it doesn't fit her character at all. My dislike for Wukong is mostly because he's a boring character with very little to him.
> 
> And don't worry, everyone ships their waifus with themselves. {{sticker:sona-playing}}

Well Ekko has a Crush on Janna and I don't see it as a bad ship tbh ..

It doesn't have to be Riot , I mean Ezreal x  Lux and Taric x Ezreal and a lot others started from fans too

Ekko has a crush on Janna? Where did you get that idea from?

Are you _maybe_ confusing Janna with Jinx? Jinx was the one Ekko has a quote towards that he had a crush on her.... before she started talking with her weapons.

> [{quoted}](name=SatomiKun,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=Ej1E92rE,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-03-29T03:44:24.860+0000)
>
> Ekko has a crush on Janna? Where did you get that idea from?
> 
> Are you _maybe_ confusing Janna with Jinx? Jinx was the one Ekko has a quote towards that he had a crush on her.... before she started talking with her weapons.

I found that that in Janna's Wiki in Trivia section

I think it's false. Other than the wiki, there is no other place where it's mentioned Ekko having a crush on Janna. 

Also, even if it was canon, it's kind of weird now? Janna isn't even human anymore thanks to the new lore. Plus they seem to have a slightly big age gap, so...
Doesn't stop Zoe from having a crush on Ezreal.
Hm, good point. But it's not speculation, it's canon and it's obvious. Janna and Ekko? Little to nothing about them. And wiki isn't always a reliable source.

I love how all these weebs are getting scared that the not real waifu they ship with themselves will have someone else xd actually disgusting

:^) atleast i have my katarina to ship with myself since she single ready to mingle :^){{champion:55}}
